lead_paragraph: Don’t limit corporate spending. Instead, raise Congress’s budget.

headline.print_headline: A Better Way to Rein in Lobbying
headline.main: A Better Way to Rein In Lobbying

snippet: Don’t limit corporate spending. Instead, raise Congress’s budget.
abstract: Op-Ed article by New America senior fellow Lee Drutman submits that increasing funding to Congress and its research arms is better way to counter corporate influence in government than caps on corporate spending on political influence; holds that low government salaries result in high turnover rate among committee staff members, who often leave to become lobbyists; says solution is not to reduce number of lobbyists but to balance them on government side.
